title: EVEN MORE WB Games Woes - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.27.25
description:
Go to https://kindafunny.com/chicago to grab your tickets!

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10%
off your first month.

We’re here to talk about video game news!

00:00:00 - Start
00:05:12 - Housekeeping
THE HUNT IS ON! Answer the call of the wilds and join GREG MILLER and the crew this Friday February 28 for the launch of Monster Hunter Wilds! Greg will lead the crew for a marathon stream exclusively on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames where they'll stream for as long as you want to hunt. Also play alongside the crew so you can jump in and help on the hunts if/when the crew needs it!
Today:
You already got our live reaction to the Pokemon Direct and Gamescast as a Pokemon Post-Show!
The STREAM is a LONG Monster Hunter Wilds one with Greg, MIke, and the team!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway about Monica Lewinsky stealing gregway from you yesterday.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining, Karl Jacobs, OmegaBuster, & Karin Lindner
The Roper Report   -
00:09:59 - Terminator 2D: No Fate Announced
00:19:40 - EVEN MORE WB Games Woes, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:34:10 - Ad  
00:36:35 - Pokemon Presents Recap
00:42:45 - Eternal Strands teams up with Final Fantasy artist and No More Heroes studio for free DLC, Matt Wales @ Eurogamer
00:46:00 - Could We Get College Basketball Back? Steven T. Wright @ GameSpot
00:47:40 - HEY, LOOK AT THIS: A Dating App for Picking Games! Ethan Gach @ Kotaku writes:
00:52:16 - Wee News!


The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny
